page.topic: How do I invite users to my account?

description.p: Log in to TransForm Central. Then click the Home tab at the top. From the list of choices, choose Invite Users To Join a TransForm Account. On screen instructions will show you what to do.
Log into *[extlink:TransForm Central@https://transform.alphasoftware.com]* and go to the *[ui:Home]* tab.

Enter the emails, one email per line, for the users you wish to invite. You can optionally specify their account display name, roles, password, and whether or not they should recieve and invitation email. See [Inviting Users] for details.
Finally, click *[ui:OK]* to send the invitations.
